alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Collier, southeastern Hendry and central Broward Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 202 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from Golden Gate Estates to 8 miles north of Big Cypress National Preserve. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Belle Meade, Orangetree, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Copeland, Hendry Correctional, Big Cypress National Preserve, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Big Corkscrew Island, Naples Manor, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards and Lely. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
